text: @KFaulders Dear @VP please don’t waste our time praising/lying about @realDonaldTrump leadership during #COVID19 crisis. #TrumpIsKillingUs #TrumpOwnsThisCrisis #25thAmendmentBeforeWeAllDie @WhiteHouse @PressSec @ProjectLincoln @Acosta @kaitlancollins @kasie @JoeNBC @NicolleDWallace
